name: thermostatMode_turnOn
description: This function is used to turn on the thermostat mode of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to turn on the thermostat mode.

parameters.name: predefinedThermostatMode
parameters.description: The predefined thermostat mode to turn on.

parameters.name: mode
parameters.description: The mode to turn on the thermostat.
